content: the lengthy loofah pattern by maughanfabrication intro back loofah s are an outstanding way to upkeep hygiene prevent acne and scratch the itch you cannot reach when you make your own loofahs you are doing three things saving money creating a sustainable product and starting a new crochet project loofahs for your back in store can typically cost $8-10 00 each while a skein of cotton scrub yarn costs around $5 00 with a little bit of time you can save some of that money for extra yarn and keep plastic waste out of a land�ll this pattern creates a machine washable and reusable loofah that would be great for markets or gifting it is easily modi�able for those who need additional length for mobility purposes as well for the purpose of this demonstration demonstrative images were taken using acrylic yarn since scrub yarn is textured and it makes the visibility of stitches dif�cult note us abbr pattern sizes level beginner measurements finished product size is roughly 24 -30 depending on the number of stitches/length you prefer abbreviations fo = fasten_off chain = chain cluster = cluster double_crochet = double_crochet half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet repeat = repeat single_crochet = single_crochet slip_stitch = slip_stitch st = stitch materials yarns lily sugar & cream scrub off -
